DOC.brief_summary: This proof principle study evaluate experimental formulation paracetamol develop eventual long lasting use . This study also use drug safety evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Compare Sustained Release Standard Paracetamol Formulations .
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) : Body Mass Index must range 1928 kg/m2 . Disease : Current recurrent disease could affect action , absorption , elimination disposition study medication clinical laboratory assessment ( e.g . hepatic disorder evidence abnormal liver function test , hepatitis serology test liver image study , renal insufficiency , congestive heart failure ) . Current relevant previous history serious , severe unstable physical psychiatric illness , medical disorder may require treatment make participant unlikely fully complete study , condition present undue risk study medication procedure .
